description: Jake Holmes, left, and Trevor Huff grow medical marijuana as caregivers at their home in Monroe, Maine. (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News21)

Huff reveals a room full of immature marijuana plants as part of his indoor grow. Huff and his business partner, Holmes, don't yet have any plants growing outside. (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News21)
Marijuana seedlings are grown in cups until they are ready to be planted outside. The plants are kept under 24-hour-light to accelerate their growth. (Photo by Katie Cambell | News21)

The backyard grow site has several rows of planters made of fabric and wire fencing held up by wooden stakes, but Huff and Holmes are still preparing their plants for outdoor cultivation.  (Photo by Katie Cambell | News21)

Bernie the St. Bernard stands close by to Jake Holmes and Trevor Huff as they shovel fresh dirt. They are preparing an outdoor grow for their medical marijuana plants. (Photo by Katie Cambell | News21)
